title: Did a Dominion Voting Systems Employee Brag About Rigging the Election Against Trump?
subtitle: Right-wing activists and commentators, including President Trump's sons and lawyers, targeted an elections technology employee in November 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Eric Coomer, director of product strategy and security for Dominion Voting Systems, bragged about rigging the 2020 election against Donald Trump in an antifa conference call.
